attributes.title: A SCAM FROM THE LEFTISTS AND RUSSIA!!!
attributes.review:

I think they teamed up with the evil left to support minorities and women which is COMPLETELY RIDICULOUS!! Whenever I would try to talk with sunny d I would get a text back in Russian or Chinese which isnâ€™t patriotic AT ALL. On top of that, when I would put it in google translate it would say something like â€œuse this app to support black lives matter and plan parenthoodâ€ which are DEVIL WORSHIPING RUSSIAN GROUPS.

I also wanted to buy MAGA hats to support, donald but when I purchased 10 hats it thanked me for my donation to plan parenthood and black lives matter! Everyone knows all lives matter and that abortion is murder and those evil groups took my money!! All I wanted was a safe space to support my racist, homophobic, sexist views and to support my president.

I really had high hopes but I was really disappointed. It really isnâ€™t my oversized pumpkin and mike wazowski who are running this app it is communists and leftists. I recommend all Trump supporters either stay away or leave a one star review sharing this information so this app gets taken down. It really is a crime against the government and should not be allowed to continue. Please share this with your conservative friends and family because abortion is devil worship and really itâ€™s the blue lives that matter. Stay strong and remember to make America great again by leaving a bad review in this app.
